sentences.en: All through the mill they got this cotton dust and lint that fills up the air.
sentences.cn: 他们让厂房里的棉尘,棉絮到处乱飞.

sentences.en: Excessive lint accumulation at the sides of under casing.
sentences.cn: 罩盖侧边的棉回花聚集太多.

sentences.en: Flicked the lint off the coat.
Fluff: Loose surface fibres on paper . Also called Fuzz , Lint.
sentences.cn: 起毛: 纸面上的松散纤维.

sentences.en: Fortunately, many of these problems can be mitigated with a good lint program.
sentences.cn: 还好, 这些问题中有许多都可以在良好的lint程序中得以缓解.

sentences.en: He cut his hand, which I did up with mercurochrome, lint and bandages.
sentences.cn: 他割破了手, 我用红药水, 绒布和绷带替他包扎起来.

sentences.en: Her hand brushed a speck of lint from her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她的手掸掉衣裙上的一点棉花絮.

sentences.en: Increased seed cotton drying and lint to clear.
sentences.cn: 增加了籽棉烘干和皮棉清理.

sentences.en: Lint: Loose surface fibres on paper.
sentences.cn: 纸毛: 纸上面的松散纤维.

sentences.en: Products: cotton lint, fiberboard, compound fertilizer, quality seeds ect.
sentences.cn: 主要产品: 皮棉、中纤板 、 复合肥、棉清油 、 良种.

sentences.en: Shaver, Steam Iron, Tie Rack, Lint Shaver, Massager Hygiene and Healthcare Products.
sentences.cn: 采购产品剃须刀, 蒸汽铁, 配合机架, 林特剃须刀, 按摩器及保健产品.

sentences.en: The dryer lint screen should be cleaned off between each load.
sentences.cn: 每次装入衣物后,都要将烘干设备清理干净.

sentences.en: There are a few problems of air pollution by chemicals, lint, etc., but these are minor.
sentences.cn: 化学品 、 棉花等也造成一些空气污染问题, 但这是次要的.

sentences.en: Wipe off any streaks using a clean area of the lint - free rag.
sentences.cn: 然后,用这条不起毛的布上一块干净的区域继续把玻璃上的条纹消除.

sentences.en: You got lint on your fuzz. - Ow! That's me!
sentences.cn: 你的毛上有线头-哦! 那是我身上的!

trans.tran_cn: （保护伤口的）软麻布，棉绒，棉纤维，绒布
trans.tran_en: Lint is cotton or linen fabric which you can put on your skin if you have a cut
